channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Citi ThankYou Rewards transfer partners: Redeem your points with airlines and hotels
item.description: Who are the Citi ThankYou Rewards transfer partners? Learn about the different airline and hotel loyalty programs, and how you can redeem your points.

item.title: Why you may want the Ink Business Preferred over the Chase Sapphire Reserve
item.description: Here are six reasons why you may want to consider applying for the Chase Ink Business Preferred over the premium Chase Sapphire Reserve.

item.title: Inside look: This new points hotel in Paris offers Eiffel Tower views and luxurious accommodations from 110,000 Hilton points
item.description: The Sax Paris is an intimate new luxury hotel on the Left Bank in Paris with a showstopping rooftop restaurant and a cozy subterranean spa.

item.title: Little-known South American airline adds new route to Washington, DC, its 2nd US city
item.description: Boliviana will add Washington Dulles to its route map with direct flights from Santa Cruz in November.

item.title: If you've been struggling to find a Global Entry interview, try this
item.description: On the first Monday of the month, U.S. Customs and Border Protection releases Global Entry interview appointment slots for conditionally approved appl...
